name: Teleport
code: function executeSkill(context) { const targetPos = selectTarget({ type: 'grid', range: 5, filter: 'all' }); if (!targetPos || targetPos.needsTargetSelection) { return targetPos; } const pieceAtPos = context.battle.pieces.find(p => p.x === targetPos.x && p.y === targetPos.y && p.currentHp > 0); if (pieceAtPos) { return { message: 'è¯¥ä½ç½®å·²æœ‰æ£‹å­ï¼Œæ— æ³•ä¼ é€', success: false }; } sourcePiece.x = targetPos.x; sourcePiece.y = targetPos.y; return { message: sourcePiece.name + 'ä¼ é€åˆ°äº†(' + targetPos.x + ',' + targetPos.y + ')', success: true }; }
